title: Grassland farming
creator_credit: Donald Wilder, Julian Biggs and Canada. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: Helps the farmer assess his grassland farming practices and suggests ways of increasing gains. Shows why grass is the most economical livestock feed to grow and notes its importance in soil conservation. Shows how to start a good grass forage crop, the fertilizer to use, and the strip grazing method of permanent pasture using a moveable electric fence to allocate a fresh area daily.
